text: John Henry Olsen (21 January 1928 â€“ 11 April 2023) was an Australian artist. He is known for his landscape artwork. He won the 2005 Archibald Prize for his portrait Self-portrait Janus-faced. He has been called "Australia's most famous living artist." Olsen was born in Newcastle, New South Wales. He grew up at Bondi Beach in Sydney. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Artists from New South Wales Category:Australian painters Category:Officers of the Order of the British Empire Category:Order of Australia Category:People from Sydney Category:People from Newcastle, New South Wales
title: John Olsen (Australian artist)
